io.fusionfire.rx.java.fruit.core

Class FruitProcessor<T extends Fruit>

  • java.lang.Object
    • rx.Subscriber<Fruit>
      • io.fusionfire.rx.java.fruit.core.FruitProcessor<T>
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    rx.functions.Func1<T,java.lang.Boolean>, rx.functions.Function, rx.Observer<Fruit>, rx.Subscription

    public class FruitProcessor<T extends Fruit>
extends rx.Subscriber<Fruit>
implements rx.functions.Func1<T,java.lang.Boolean>
    Fruit Processor is the Observer in Rx Paradigm Processor waits for Fruits Emitted by the Fruit Basket Observable and do the processing (that is cutting Fruit into 5 pieces.
    Author:
    arafkarsh
